3: As you look for a way in, Murray happens to come through in your comms.
Signal's finally back. What's your status?
We've discovered a colossal creature here. We're unsure how to get near it yet.
No worries. There should be a transport pod from the old factories where you guys are. You can give that a shot.
Murray, you seem to be very familiar with the layout of this place.
I just found a map of this underground city, so I've marked a concealed entry for you guys.
Hold on. Something came up that I've got to handle. Talk soon.
Murray smiles as he disconnects. Lee frowns, being lost in thought.
Liv, analyze the background noises in our call with Murray.
Analysis complete. There were two faint sounds in the background during the call.
One came from the cries of Hetero-Creatures, the other the sound of the wind.
I see. That Murray was indeed an imposter.
The transport pod is quite possibly just another trap.
If it was not Murray, who is it?
I remember Commandant mentioning an Ascendant who can turn invisible and shapeshift...
'Murry' will call again soon. This time we have to track her down.
